definition: to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)
to reach perfection (idiom); a superb artistic achievement
efferent nerve (transmitting out from the brain)/efferent neuron/motor nerve

sentences.english: MO’AT, on her knees beneath the Mother Tree, writhes her arms in the trance state.
sentences.chinese: 姆阿特跪在圣母之树下，恍惚出神地大幅挥舞着手臂。

sentences.english: Qian red also trained its first this ribbon dance, dance to magic.
sentences.chinese: 芊红也练着自己的首本丝带舞，舞得出神入化。

sentences.english: He sank into the chair, and brooded over the embers, and shed tears.
sentences.chinese: 他坐在椅子上，望着火炉的余烬兀自出神，淌着眼泪。

sentences.english: Her piano playing is absolute magic .
sentences.chinese: 她的钢琴弹得真是出神入化。

sentences.english: It distracted me, causing me to bump into two young brothers.
sentences.chinese: 我盯着气球出神，不小心跟两个小兄弟撞了个满怀。

sentences.english: And this phenomenon was accompanied by visions and trances .
sentences.chinese: 这种现象是伴随着异像和出神状态而来。

sentences.english: Evening after evening, …gazing off west as if in reverie.
sentences.chinese: 只见我出神似的倚在桥栏上向西天凝望。

sentences.english: He was lost in thought, staring at the boundless night sky .
sentences.chinese: 夜晚，他望着浩茫的星空出神。

sentences.english: We are the persons who are gently affected and become fascinated when we think of Junki!
sentences.chinese: 是一想到俊基，心就会温柔地牵动，微微出神地人。

sentences.english: She was sixty years old and had frequent trances.
sentences.chinese: 她六十岁了，经常处于出神状态。

sentences.english: George sat entranced with his own picture.
sentences.chinese: 乔治盯着自己的画出神。

sentences.english: They were enraptured at the scene.
I looked at the dark ceiling unfeelingly.
sentences.chinese: 睁着双大眼睛，怔怔的望着漆黑的天花板出神。

sentences.english: From the first note the singer's voice entranced the audience.
sentences.chinese: 演唱者唱出的第一个音符就使听众出神了。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the efferent pathway from the dorsal raphe nucleus to the inner ear.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨中缝背核至内耳的传出神经通路。

sentences.english: He stood entranced of the sight.
sentences.chinese: 他站在那里望着那景色出神。

definition: to stare blankly/to be stunned/to be lost in thought
unable to take one's eyes off (idiom); to gaze steadily/to stare
